points.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
points.analysis: Both the Privacy Notice and the Cookies Policy are very easy to read, with concise and comprehensive terms

case.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
case.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

points.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
points.analysis: You can change the language of the page at any time by using the selector on the top of the screen

case.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
case.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

case.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

points.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

case.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
case.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.

points.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is friendlier to user privacy protection
points.analysis:
You can choose from the following regions when you sign up for your MoodleCloud site
AU (Sydney)
EU (Ireland)
US (Oregon)

case.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is friendlier to user privacy protection
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for strong data regulations and user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

points.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

case.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
case.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.

points.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
points.analysis: You may return your order only if it is the wrong size, incorrect colour to what you ordered, or if you receive damaged goods. We do not offer refunds or exchanges for change of mind purposes

case.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

points.title: The service is open-source

case.title: The service is open-source
case.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.

points.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

case.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
case.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: A free help desk is provided
points.analysis: You can ask for the help of a 24/7 chatbot which will contact you with the Moodle team that can help you with your questions

case.title: A free help desk is provided
case.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

case.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
case.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

points.title: First-party cookies are used

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

case.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
case.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.

points.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties

case.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties
case.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.

points.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

case.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
case.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
